attributes.action: apply pressure for Chinese action on Burma by instigating an international boycott of the Beijing Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: China has a massive influence on the Military Government in Burma.  By threatening a boycott of the Beijing Olympics we feel that they will no longer be able to ignore their responsibilities to act in the interests of the people of Burma.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
